attributes.action: Please ask the Government to sack Ofgem for their outrageous Price Cap!
attributes.additional_details: Parliament has the responsibilty to help the poorest.
attributes.background: Government should replace Ofgem personal with the instruction to negotiate a deal that does not lead to Energy Companies making such obscene profits at the consumers' expense. The number of consumers that will be driven to extreme hardship is unforgiveable.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes petitions requesting public servants be dismissed.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Inquiry into Ofgem to determine if it is fit for purpose: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621602
